#summary Details about filing Issues

The popular package management system Cydia currently contains a version of mobileterminal that is known to not work in newer versions of iOS.  See the Downloads section for newer binaries and check out the [http://code.google.com/p/mobileterminal/wiki/Installation Installation] wiki for details on how to install if you need assistance.  Please do not file bug reports about older binaries.

If you aren't sure what to do, then ask a question in the Google Group, or read the archives, instead of filing a bug report.  http://groups.google.com/group/mobileterminal

Continue on to the [http://code.google.com/p/mobileterminal/issues/list full list of issues]
